projects.title: Smartline
projects.description: Minimalistic, intuitive and comprehensive news platform for managing digital content in a fast and straightforward way. It consists of a control panel for content contribution, a RESTful API and a web and native Android app for end users.

projects.title: Prode
projects.description: Football (or soccer, depending on your country) is probably one of the most popular sports in the world. This web app is a simple platform for placing bets on amateur football tournaments, just for fun. This can also be used on professional football leagues.

projects.title: ChallenGeo
projects.description: Simple geo quiz app that provides not only info on countries (flags, population, capital city, currency, languages and so on) but also has a quiz in which the user has to choose to which country the displayed flag, capital city, etc. corresponds to.

projects.title: Light Switch
projects.description: This is a simple home automation tool that relies on HTTP requests being sent from an Android app to a Python web service running on a Raspberry Pi to remotely turn lights and other devices on and off.

projects.title: Node Module Generator
projects.description: A Yeoman generator for scaffolding simple node modules. Provides a JavaScript linter (JSHint), unit test support (Jest) and a bunch of useful Grunt tasks.

projects.title: GitHub Page Generator
projects.description: A Yeoman generator for scaffolding simple web frontends, particularly GitHub pages. Some of the built-in packages include Sass, RequireJS, Hogan.js, The Intern, Grunt, and many others.

projects.title: ui-component Generator
projects.description: A Yeoman generator for scaffolding reusable, standalone and self-contained ui-components.

projects.title: jsort
projects.description: Simple array sorting utility supporting multiple data types: text, numbers, currencies, objects and dates (in a variety of formats).

projects.title: Wordish
projects.description: Wordish sends a new word to your Android phone once a day. Users are able to set when they want to get the notification, which consists of the word itself with its pronunciation, a definition and a couple examples of the word being used in context.

projects.title: SportsEvts
projects.description: Create and schedule sport events in your area and share them with friends. Pick a place and set an hour, and invite other people to join the game.
